data.title: NIST CSF: Identify
data.phrase:
/*tamodel | filter xdm.target.location.region contains "" | fields xdm.target.agent.identifier, xdm.target.asn.as_name, xdm.target.asn.as_number, xdm.target.host.fqdn, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.location.city, xdm.target.location.continent, xdm.target.location.country, xdm.target.location.latitude, xdm.target.location.longitude , xdm.target.location.region */

datamodel | filter xdm.target.location.region contains ""
| fields xdm.target.agent.identifier, xdm.target.asn.as_name, xdm.target.asn.as_number, xdm.target.host.fqdn, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.location.city, xdm.target.location.continent, xdm.target.location.country, xdm.target.location.latitude, xdm.target.location.longitude , xdm.target.location.region
| comp count() as counter by xdm.target.location.country 
| view graph type = map xaxis = xdm.target.location.country yaxis = counter default_limit = `false` seriestitle("counter","Volume")

data.title: NIST CSF: Protect
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" 
| filter xdm.observer.version != "7.8.0.64267"
| fields xdm.observer.*
| comp count () as NON_COMPLIANT_VERSION
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Agent check in the past 24 hours without compliant policy" xaxis = NON_COMPLIANT_VERSION yaxis = NON_COMPLIANT_VERSION

command.name: header
command.value: "Agent check in the past 24 hours without compliant policy"

data.title: NIST CSF: Detect
data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_extensions_policy, assigned_prevention_policy

data.title: NIST CSF: Respond
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: NIST CSF: Recover
data.phrase:
//check disk encryption status on endpoints

/*
dataset = endpoints
| comp values(endpoint_name) as Endpoint, count(agent_license_type) as Total by encryption_status
| fields encryption_status, Endpoint, Total
| sort desc Total
*/

dataset = endpoints
| comp values(endpoint_name) as Endpoint, count(agent_license_type) as Total by encryption_status
| fields encryption_status, Endpoint, Total
| sort desc Total
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped header = "Disk encryption status" xaxis = encryption_status yaxis = Total
